  fbq('track', {{LT - Facebook Event Name}},
    {
      'currency': {{DLV - Currency}},
      'contents': {{DLV - Products}},
      'order_id': {{DLV - Transaction ID}},
      'value': {{DLV - Transaction Total}},
    },
    {
      'eventID': {{UID - Unique Event ID}},
    }
  );
</script>
